Key:
Ah. I was going to invite someone to go on the
hill for a date but... I was so worried about Kotori
I couldn't end up inviting anyone.
Translation:
Ah. Iba a invitar a alguien a ir a la colina para una cita
pero... Estaba tan preocupado por Kotori que no pude
Terminar invitando a nadie.

Key:
I guess today is kind of lost then. I can go
shopping then go home and wait for Kotori.
Translation:
Supongo que el día de hoy está perdido entonces.
Puedo ir de compras y luego ir a casa y esperar a Kotori.

Key: ...I'm home.
Oh, you're finally home!
Shido? What are you doing there all by yourself?
Oh, nothing really.
Weird... is the bath already prepared?
Yeah, I got it ready.

Okay, then I'm going to go wash up.
I'm gonna be a while so don't worry about me.
Translation:
Bien, entonces voy a lavarme. Voy a tardar un rato
Así que no te preocupes por mí.

Key: W-Wait a minute!
...What? Don't tell me you want to go in with me.
Translation: ...¿Qué? No me digas que quieres entrar conmigo.

Key: O-Of course not!
Then what is it?

Oh... well... do you want to continue
our date from the afternoon?
Translation:
Oh... bueno…
¿quieres continuar nuestra cita de la tarde?

Key: What? Now? What time do you think it is?!

Well, our date was cut short wasn't it? I thought
maybe we could go on a walk. What do you say?
That's kind of like a date, isn't it?
Translation:
Bueno, nuestra cita se acorto, ¿no? Pensé que tal vez
podríamos ir a dar un paseo. ¿Qué te parece?
Eso es como una cita, ¿no?

Key:
Um... you're a Spirit. If I leave you be, there's
a chance you might go rogue, right?
Translation:
Um... eres un Espíritu. Si te dejo en paz, hay
Existe la posibilidad de que te vuelvas pícara, ¿verdad?

Key: W-Well, yeah, but...

If you end up feeling the kind of pain
you felt before, I...
Translation:
Si acabas sintiendo el tipo de dolor
Que sentías antes, yo...

Key: Ah. If you're tired, we don't have to do it tonight.
Translation: Ah. Si estás cansado, no tenemos que hacerlo esta noche.

Key: Yeah, let's go.
No worries, we can just... wait, what?
Come on. Let's go.
Y-You sure?

You're the one who's inviting me.
Do you not want to go?
Translation:
Eres tú quien me invita.
¿No quieres ir?

Key: N-No, I'll go! Let's go!
Okay, hurry up and get ready.
O-Okay...

It's been a while since the two of us have
taken a walk like this.
Translation: Hacía tiempo que no dábamos un paseo así.

Key: Yeah...

Before you used to be so happy-go-lucky!
You would just call me Onii-chan and follow
me around everywhere!
Translation:
¡Antes solías ser tan despreocupada!
¡Me llamabas Onii-chan y me
Seguías a todas partes!

Key: You sure became a busy person.
Translation: Seguro que te has convertido en una persona ocupada.

Key:
I couldn't help it. We're the only ones who can
deal with the dangers of the Spirits.
Translation:
No pude evitarlo. Somos los únicos que podemos
Hacer frente a los peligros de los Espíritus.

Key:
Yeah... compared to back then,
you're totally like an adult now.
Translation:
Sí... comparado con entonces,
Ahora eres totalmente como un adulto.

Key: ...Adult?

Yeah. Going on a date at night like this
makes me think about how time has passed.
Translation:
Sí. Ir a una cita de noche así me hace pensar
En cómo ha pasado el tiempo.

Key: Date? It's really just a night stroll.
Translation: ¿Una cita? En realidad es sólo un paseo nocturno.

Key:
Oh? Maybe we should hold hands
to make it feel more like a date.
Translation:
¿Oh? Tal vez deberíamos tomarnos de la mano
Para que se sienta más como una cita.

Key:
W-What are you suggesting?
I'm not some child!
Oh. So you don't like that sort of thing?
Translation: Oh. ¿Así que no te gustan ese tipo de cosas?

Key: No. I don't hate it.
Then here... lend me your hand.

What do you think? Does it feel more like
a date now?
Translation: ¿Qué te parece? ¿Te parece más una cita ahora?

Key: How stupid.

Don't be like that. This is a date.
This isn't so bad, is it?
Translation:
No seas así. Esto es una cita.
Esto no es tan malo, ¿verdad?

Key: Yeah...
Hey, Kotori...
What is it?

I feel like I get where you're at, but...
don't push yourself too much, okay?
Translation:
Siento que entiendo dónde estás, pero…
No te presiones demasiado, ¿de acuerdo?

Key: I know.
If there's anything I can do, let me know.
Translation: Si hay algo que pueda hacer, dímelo.

Key: I'll do anything.
Kotori... are you listening?
I see. You said anything, right? Good.

What? Oh, maybe not... anything!
Forget I said that!
Translation:
¿Qué cosa? Oh, tal vez no... ¡nada!
¡Olvida lo que he dicho!

Key:
Too late. I heard it already. I'll be
counting on you Onii-chan.
Translation:
Demasiado tarde. Ya lo he oído.
Contaré contigo Onii-chan.

Key: Hahaha...
